original_title: Cap Snap Lanka wins 4 Golds at National Quality and Productivity Convention
original_body_lines: Cap Snap Lanka (Pvt) Ltd, won four Gold Awards at the National Convention on Quality and Productivity 2025, held recently at the Mount Lavinia Hotel, where its subsidiary, American Polymers (Pvt) Ltd, also received a Silver Award. The event was organised by the Sri Lanka Association for the Advancement of Quality and Productivity (SLAAQP). The four Gold Awards won by Cap Snap Lanka were for the achievements of its Quality Control Circles: Team Crystal (QCC2510276), Eco Guardians (QCC2510278), Perfect Finders (QCC2510280), and Clarity Achievers (QCC2510279). American Polymers received a Silver Award for its Quality Control Circle, The Counting Arc (QCC2510272).

Cap Snap Lanka, established in June 2003, is a total turnkey packaging solution provider. With its sister entity American Polymers, provides rigid plastic packaging for industries such as Water, Tea, Paint, Pharmaceuticals, Dairy, Beverages, Edible Oil and Detergent. With over two decades of experience, it operates two advanced production plants in Homagama and Artigala, with a combined workspace of 300,000+ square feet. The group of company employs over 1,000 people directly and supports indirectly more than 5000 livelihoods. Currently the company supports more than 250+ leading Brands across the island.
